properties.description: This initiative has been deprecated. The Azure Security Benchmark initiative now represents the Azure Security Benchmark v2 controls, and serves as the Azure Security Center default policy initiative. Please assign that initiative, or manage its policies and compliance results within Azure Security Center.

metadata.displayName: List of users excluded from Windows VM Administrators group
metadata.description: A semicolon-separated list of members that should be excluded in the Administrators local group. Ex: Administrator; myUser1; myUser2

metadata.displayName: List of users that must be included in Windows VM Administrators group
metadata.description: A semicolon-separated list of members that should be included in the Administrators local group. Ex: Administrator; myUser1; myUser2

metadata.displayName: List of users that Windows VM Administrators group must *only* include
metadata.description: A semicolon-separated list of all the expected members of the Administrators local group. Ex: Administrator; myUser1; myUser2

metadata.displayName: List of regions where Network Watcher should be enabled
metadata.description: To see a complete list of regions use Get-AzLocation
Name of the resource group of NetworkWatcher, such as NetworkWatcherRG

metadata.displayName: Virtual network where VMs should be connected
Network gateway that virtual networks should use
List of workspace IDs where Log Analytics agents should connect
metadata.description: A semicolon-separated list of the workspace IDs that the Log Analytics agent should be connected to

metadata.displayName: List of resource types that should have resource logs enabled
metadata.description: Audit diagnostic setting for selected resource types
Latest supported PHP version for App Services
Latest supported Java version for App Services
Latest supported Python version for App Services
Latest supported Python version for App Services
